meanings.sent1: She middlingly completed her homework on time.
meanings.sent2: He always middlingly helps his friends when they need it.
meanings.sent3: The cat middlingly chased after the laser pointer, never quite catching it.
meanings.sent4: The sun middlingly peeked through the clouds, casting a soft glow on the field.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed middlingly, adding a touch of color to the garden.

meanings.definition: In a mediocre or average manner.
meanings.sent1: She performed middlingly in the singing competition.
meanings.sent2: The team played middlingly in the championship game.
meanings.sent3: The cake turned out middlingly, not too sweet but not too bland either.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline looked middlingly beautiful in the evening light.
meanings.sent5: The movie was middlingly entertaining, not great but not terrible either.
